detectors.description:
qnml.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#36-45) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#38)
	- balances[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#39)

detectors.description:
qnml.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#47-57) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#49)
	- balances[from] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#50)
	- allowed[from][msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#51)

detectors.description: Contract qnml (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#14-76) is not in CapWords

qnml.smartfastConstructorVariables() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#14-76) uses literals with too many digits:
	- initialSupply = 7500000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#16)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- qnml.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#22-24)
	- ERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#4)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- qnml.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#28-30)
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#5)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- qnml.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#32-34)
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#6)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#8)
	- qnml.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#59-63)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#9)
	- qnml.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#36-45)
